contextId.information: This was about 3,000 liters of olive oil. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bvolume]])
contextId.quote: A hundred baths of olive oil

contextId.information: You may convert this to a modern measure. AT: "twenty thousand liters of wheat" or "a thousand baskets of wheat" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bvolume]])
